contextId.occurrenceNote: People under God's judgment are expressing their grief in a strong way. Alternate translation: "I roll myself on the ground" or "I roll myself in the mud" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-symaction]])
contextId.glQuote: I roll myself in the dust

contextId.occurrenceNote: Israelites who were mourning would shave bald spots on their heads. Possible meanings are 1) "Shave larger spots than usual on your heads" or 2) "Cut off all your hair and shave your heads," stating the events in the order in which they were to occur. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-symaction]])
contextId.glQuote: Shave your head and cut off your hair

contextId.occurrenceNote: They do this to show that they are ashamed of what they have done. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-symaction]])
contextId.glQuote: They will put their hands on their mouths
